title: Whistler Snowboarding
content:
Plenty of snowboarding over the last 5 days!

I have picked up enough from lessons (including help from Jules) and practice to be able to make it down some of the green runs fairly comfortably. Definitely am getting better each day and having more fun as time goes on :)

Jules has managed to get more speed and started doing some jumps - definitely also getting better!

Have also been doing the runs with a couple of guys we worked with from JB - we can basically pair off with skill levels so being able to hang out with them has been awesome!

Snowmobile and dogsledding day tomorrow - will be a good “rest” day from snowboarding getting us ready for one last day before we leave Whistler.
